title: Fandom (website)
summary: Fandom[lower-alpha 1] (also known as Wikia before October 2016) is an American wiki hosting service and domain operated by Fandom, Inc. (formerly known as Wikia, Inc.), a for-profit Delaware company founded in October 2004 by Jimmy Wales and Angela Beesley.[5][9] Fandom was acquired in 2018 by TPG Capital and Jon Miller through Integrated Media Co.[10]
